title: List of League of Legends media
content: League of Legends is a multiplayer online battle arena video game developed and published by Riot Games. Announced in October 2008, it was released for Microsoft Windows in Europe and North America as a free-to-play title on October 27, 2009, after six months of beta testing. The game has since been ported to macOS and localized for markets worldwide; by 2012 it was the most played game in the world.[1] League of Legends is often considered to be the biggest esport globally,[2][3][4] with the 2020 League of Legends World Championship final peaking at 45.9 million concurrent viewers.[5]
